<td style="padding-top:20px">
<p style="line-height:22px;margin-top:0;margin-bottom:15px"><strong style="color:#000">Good morning. </strong>Today at 5pm ET is the deadline for entries for the Pulitzer Prize in journalism, and we think we’re strong contenders in the following categories:</p>
<ul style="margin-top:0;padding-left:30px">
<li style="line-height:22px;margin-bottom:10px">
<span>
</span><span><strong style="color:#000">Investigative reporting: </strong></span><span>We went behind the scenes at WeWork to document the startup’s dramatic rise and fall. Well, actually we just rented an office there, but...</span>
</li>
<li style="line-height:22px;margin-bottom:10px">
<span>
</span><span><strong style="color:#000">Public service: </strong></span><span><span>We correctly predicted the Washington Nationals would win the World Series in seven games, saving everyone countless hours of watching baseball. </span></span><span>
</span>
</li>
<li style="line-height:22px;margin-bottom:10px">
<span>
</span><span><strong style="color:#000">Audio reporting: </strong></span><span><span>A brand new category deserves a brand new podcast, our very own </span></span><span><a href="https://www.morningbrew.com/business-casual-podcast" target="_blank" class="link" rel="noopener" style="border-bottom:2px solid #1c7ff2;text-decoration:none;color:#333"><em>Business Casual</em></a></span><span><span>. </span></span><span>
</span>
</li>
<li style="line-height:22px;margin-bottom:10px">
<span>
</span><span><strong style="color:#000">Criticism: </strong></span><span><span>We get a lot of it. </span></span><span>
</span>
</li>
</ul>
<p style="line-height:22px;margin-top:0;margin-bottom:15px"><strong style="color:#000"></strong>If you want to see us win a Pulitzer, let <a href="https://twitter.com/PulitzerPrizes" target="_blank" class="link" rel="noopener" style="border-bottom:2px solid #1c7ff2;text-decoration:none;color:#333">@PulitzerPrizes</a> know on Twitter.</p>

<div class="c6 " style="margin-bottom:7px">
<!-- <![endif]-->
<table width="100%" cellpadding="0" cellspacing="0" border="0" style="border-collapse: collapse;">
<tr>
<th class="card" style="text-align:left;font-weight:400;font-family:Helvetica, Arial, sans-serif;font-size:16px;color:#333;display:block;background-color:#fff;border-radius:15px;border:1px solid #e6e6e6;border-collapse:collapse;box-shadow:none;margin-bottom:0px">
<table width="100%" cellpadding="0" cellspacing="0" border="0" style="border-collapse: collapse;">
<tr>
<td style="padding: 15px;">
<h3 style="font-family:Helvetica, Arial, sans-serif;font-size:16px;color:#1c7ff2;font-weight:700;margin-top:0;margin-bottom:0">
PERSONAL FINANCE
</h3>
<h1 style="font-family:Helvetica, Arial, sans-serif;font-size:24px;color:#333;font-weight:700;margin-bottom:0;line-height:26px;margin-top:8px">
<a href="https://www.morningbrew.com/daily/stories/2020/01/23/changes-coming-credit-scores?email={{profile.email}}" target="_blank" style="color:#000000!important;text-decoration:none;border-bottom:none!important;">
<font color="#000000">
Creditworthiness Where Creditworthiness Is Due
</font></a>
</h1>
</td>
</tr>
</table>
<!--[if mso]>
<img alt="Bart Simpson " style="display: block; width: 100%; max-width: 670px;" width="670" height=511 src="https://media.giphy.com/media/3o6Mb3OomPa9u6s7IY/giphy.gif">
<![endif]-->
<!--[if !mso]>--><!-- -->
<img class="story-header-image" alt="Bart Simpson " style="display: block; width: 100%; max-width: 670px;" width="670" src="https://media.giphy.com/media/3o6Mb3OomPa9u6s7IY/giphy.gif">
<!--<![endif]-->
<p style="line-height:22px;margin-top:0;margin-bottom:15px;padding-left:10px;margin-top:5px;margin-bottom:0px;line-height:14px;">
<small><em>Giphy</em></small>
</p>
<table width="100%" cellpadding="0" cellspacing="0" border="0" style="border-collapse: collapse;">
<tr>
<td style="padding:15px">
<p style="line-height:22px;margin-top:0;margin-bottom:15px">Credit scores are like Christine Lagarde or bringing extra socks to the gym—very, very important. They affect your chances of getting loans, credit cards, and dates. </p>
<p style="line-height:22px;margin-top:0;margin-bottom:15px">So when Fair Isaac, which makes the popular FICO score, <a href="https://www.usatoday.com/story/money/2020/01/23/credit-score-those-low-scores-see-drop-under-new-fico-criteria/4553540002/?utm_source=morning_brew" target="_blank" class="link" rel="noopener" style="border-bottom:2px solid #1c7ff2;text-decoration:none;color:#333">said yesterday</a> it’s adjusting the model it uses to calculate people’s creditworthiness...we paid attention. </p>
<h2 style="font-family:Helvetica, Arial, sans-serif;font-size:19px;font-weight:700;color:#000;margin-top:0;margin-bottom:15px;margin-right:0;margin-left:0">In broad strokes: higher highs, lower lows </h2>
<p style="line-height:22px;margin-top:0;margin-bottom:15px">Americans with FICO scores on the higher end (680+) who keep paying their bills on time will likely <a href="https://www.wsj.com/articles/fico-changes-could-lower-your-credit-score-11579780800?utm_source=morning_brew" target="_blank" class="link" rel="noopener" style="border-bottom:2px solid #1c7ff2;text-decoration:none;color:#333">earn</a> an even higher score. Those with lower scores (sub-600) who continue to fall behind on payments will be punished more severely than in previous FICO models. </p>
<ul style="margin-top:0;padding-left:30px">
<li style="line-height:22px;margin-bottom:10px"><span>No need to freak out. FICO said most people—about 110 million—will see a <20 point change up or down, if any change at all. Plus, lenders can decide for themselves which FICO model to use. </span></li>
<li style="line-height:22px;margin-bottom:10px"><span>FICO noted that 40 million consumers could see a big upswing in their scores and another 40 million could see a big downswing. </span></li>
</ul>
<p style="line-height:22px;margin-top:0;margin-bottom:15px"><strong style="color:#000">One other change:</strong> Under a new FICO version, if you had a sterling payment history but started carrying larger balances in the past few months, your score might take a bigger hit.</p>
<h2 style="font-family:Helvetica, Arial, sans-serif;font-size:19px;font-weight:700;color:#000;margin-top:0;margin-bottom:15px;margin-right:0;margin-left:0">Big picture</h2>
<p style="line-height:22px;margin-top:0;margin-bottom:15px">This is a 180 from the industry's recent direction...or at least a wide right turn. In the past few years, FICO and its credit reporting pals (Equifax, Experian, TransUnion) <a href="https://www.wsj.com/articles/need-cash-companies-are-considering-magazine-subscriptions-and-phone-bills-when-making-loans-11568280601?mod=article_inline&utm_source=morning_brew" target="_blank" class="link" rel="noopener" style="border-bottom:2px solid #1c7ff2;text-decoration:none;color:#333">introduced alternative criteria</a> to nudge up credit scores and encourage new borrowers.  </p>
<ul style="margin-top:0;padding-left:30px">
<li style="line-height:22px;margin-bottom:10px">
<span>
</span><span><strong style="color:#000">One of those criteria: </strong></span><span>TransUnion sells data to U.S. lenders that may show whether consumers subscribe to magazines. It’s an “indicator of stability,” the firm’s SVP of global data strategy told the WSJ.</span>
</li>
</ul>
<p style="line-height:22px;margin-top:0;margin-bottom:15px"><strong style="color:#000">Bottom line: </strong>The changes reflect, in part, hesitations over the U.S. economy. The record-breaking expansion is still going strong, but consumer debt is at an all-time high and lenders don't want to take on unnecessary risks.</p>

<!-- <![endif]-->
<table width="100%" cellpadding="0" cellspacing="0" border="0" style="border-collapse: collapse;">
<tr>
<th class="card" style="text-align:left;font-weight:400;font-family:Helvetica, Arial, sans-serif;font-size:16px;color:#333;display:block;background-color:#fff;border-radius:15px;border:1px solid #e6e6e6;border-collapse:collapse;box-shadow:none;margin-bottom:0px">
<table width="100%" cellpadding="0" cellspacing="0" border="0" style="border-collapse: collapse;">
<tr>
<td style="padding: 15px;">
<h3 style="font-family:Helvetica, Arial, sans-serif;font-size:16px;color:#1c7ff2;font-weight:700;margin-top:0;margin-bottom:0">
PUBLIC HEALTH
</h3>
<h1 style="font-family:Helvetica, Arial, sans-serif;font-size:24px;color:#333;font-weight:700;margin-bottom:0;line-height:26px;margin-top:8px">
<a href="https://www.morningbrew.com/daily/stories/2020/01/23/coronavirus-boosts-unexpected-product-sales?email={{profile.email}}" target="_blank" style="color:#000000!important;text-decoration:none;border-bottom:none!important;">
<font color="#000000">
What Do People Buy During Virus Outbreaks?
</font></a>
</h1>
</td>
</tr>
</table>
<img alt="Man wearing a face mask " style="display: block; width: 100%; max-width: 670px;" width="670" class="story-header-image" src="https://dlp31coh2a67q.cloudfront.net/eyJrZXkiOiIxNTc5ODEwNzg5LmpwZyIsImJ1Y2tldCI6Im1vcm5pbmdicmV3LW9zbG8iLCJlZGl0cyI6eyJyZXNpemUiOnsid2lkdGgiOjEwMDAsImhlaWdodCI6bnVsbH19fQ==">
<p style="line-height:22px;margin-top:0;margin-bottom:15px;padding-left:10px;margin-top:5px;margin-bottom:0px;line-height:14px;">
<small><em>Getty Images</em></small>
</p>
<table width="100%" cellpadding="0" cellspacing="0" border="0" style="border-collapse: collapse;">
<tr>
<td style="padding:15px">
<p style="line-height:22px;margin-top:0;margin-bottom:15px">As of yesterday evening, the <a href="https://www.reuters.com/article/us-china-health/china-virus-death-toll-mounts-to-25-infections-spread-idUSKBN1ZM087?utm_source=morning_brew" target="_blank" class="link" rel="noopener" style="border-bottom:2px solid #1c7ff2;text-decoration:none;color:#333">new coronavirus</a> originating in Wuhan, China, had killed 25 people and infected more than 800. The timing couldn’t be worse: This weekend’s Lunar New Year holiday is one of the world’s busiest travel periods.</p>
<p style="line-height:22px;margin-top:0;margin-bottom:15px">Consumers are expected to curb their shopping over the holiday. But strange as it is, some products are getting a <em>boost</em> during this outbreak.</p>
<ol>
<li style="line-height:22px;margin-bottom:10px">
<span>
</span><span><strong style="color:#000">Face masks: </strong></span><span>Alibaba said it sold 80 million face masks on its Taobao website on Monday and Tuesday. As masks </span><span><a href="https://www.bloomberg.com/news/articles/2020-01-23/virus-spurs-panic-buying-of-face-masks-in-sars-scarred-hong-kong?utm_source=morning_brew" target="_blank" class="link" rel="noopener" style="border-bottom:2px solid #1c7ff2;text-decoration:none;color:#333">disappear</a></span><span> from pharmacies across Hong Kong, officials are pleading with retailers not to jack up prices. </span>
</li>
<li style="line-height:22px;margin-bottom:10px">
<span>
</span><span><strong style="color:#000">Macabre video games: </strong></span><span>On Wednesday, </span><span><em>Plague Inc. </em></span><span>became the </span><span><a href="https://nypost.com/2020/01/22/plague-inc-game-app-booming-in-china-as-coronavirus-rages/?utm_source=morning_brew" target="_blank" class="link" rel="noopener" style="border-bottom:2px solid #1c7ff2;text-decoration:none;color:#333">No. 1 paid Apple app</a></span><span> in China. The game, which allows players to unleash a pathogen on humanity, also spiked in popularity during the 2014 Ebola virus epidemic.</span>
</li>
<li style="line-height:22px;margin-bottom:10px">
<span>
</span><span><strong style="color:#000">Safe haven assets </strong></span><span>like </span><span><a href="https://www.marketwatch.com/story/gold-struggles-to-hold-above-support-level-at-1550-as-china-flu-seen-spreading-2020-01-23?utm_source=morning_brew" target="_blank" class="link" rel="noopener" style="border-bottom:2px solid #1c7ff2;text-decoration:none;color:#333">gold and U.S. Treasuries</a></span><span>. </span>
</li>
</ol>
<p style="line-height:22px;margin-top:0;margin-bottom:15px"><strong style="color:#000">Looking ahead...</strong>the World Health Organization calmed fears yesterday, <a href="https://www.cnbc.com/2020/01/23/us-futures-point-to-lower-open-on-wall-street.html?utm_source=morning_brew" target="_blank" class="link" rel="noopener" style="border-bottom:2px solid #1c7ff2;text-decoration:none;color:#333">saying</a> it’s a “bit too early to consider this event is a public health emergency of international concern.”</p>

<tr>
<th class="card" style="text-align:left;font-weight:400;font-family:Helvetica, Arial, sans-serif;font-size:16px;color:#333;display:block;background-color:#fff;border-radius:15px;border:1px solid #e6e6e6;border-collapse:collapse;box-shadow:none;margin-bottom:0px">
<table width="100%" cellpadding="0" cellspacing="0" border="0" style="border-collapse: collapse;">
<tr>
<td style="padding: 15px;">
<h3 style="font-family:Helvetica, Arial, sans-serif;font-size:16px;color:#1c7ff2;font-weight:700;margin-top:0;margin-bottom:0">
FIREARMS
</h3>
<h1 style="font-family:Helvetica, Arial, sans-serif;font-size:24px;color:#333;font-weight:700;margin-bottom:0;line-height:26px;margin-top:8px">
<a href="https://www.morningbrew.com/daily/stories/2020/01/23/icymi-worlds-biggest-firearm-trade-show-happened-week?email={{profile.email}}" target="_blank" style="color:#000000!important;text-decoration:none;border-bottom:none!important;">
<font color="#000000">
Top Gun: The Show
</font></a>
</h1>
</td>
</tr>
</table>
<img alt="Skeet shooting" style="display: block; width: 100%; max-width: 670px;" width="670" class="story-header-image" src="https://dlp31coh2a67q.cloudfront.net/eyJrZXkiOiJ1cGxvYWRzL21lZGl1bS9hc3NldC83MTQzL3NrZWV0X3Nob290aW5nLkpQRyIsImJ1Y2tldCI6Im9zbG8tcHJvZHVjdGlvbiIsImVkaXRzIjp7InJlc2l6ZSI6eyJ3aWR0aCI6MTAwMCwiaGVpZ2h0IjpudWxsfX19">
<p style="line-height:22px;margin-top:0;margin-bottom:15px;padding-left:10px;margin-top:5px;margin-bottom:0px;line-height:14px;">
<small><em>Department of Defense</em></small>
</p>
<table width="100%" cellpadding="0" cellspacing="0" border="0" style="border-collapse: collapse;">
<tr>
<td style="padding:15px">
<p style="line-height:22px;margin-top:0;margin-bottom:15px">The U.S.' biggest firearms trade show wraps up today in Vegas. But news from both inside the Sands Expo Center and out points to an industry in flux. </p>
<p style="line-height:22px;margin-top:0;margin-bottom:15px"><strong style="color:#000">Ladies first: </strong>This year, <a href="https://www.wsj.com/articles/at-the-largest-gun-show-in-the-u-s-the-focus-is-women-first-time-buyers-11579793661?mod=hp_lista_pos3&utm_source=morning_brew" target="_blank" class="link" rel="noopener" style="border-bottom:2px solid #1c7ff2;text-decoration:none;color:#333">more expo pitches</a> were catered to women and first-time buyers interested in concealed weapons, the WSJ reports. In the last five years, concealed carry permits increased almost 50%, an uptick some vendors tie to women and newcomers. </p>
<ul style="margin-top:0;padding-left:30px">
<li style="line-height:22px;margin-bottom:10px">
<span>The NRA tried wooing women with a dedicated TV channel in 2013 (though its TV division </span><span><a href="https://www.gq.com/story/nratv-collapse?utm_source=morning_brew" target="_blank" class="link" rel="noopener" style="border-bottom:2px solid #1c7ff2;text-decoration:none;color:#333">folded</a></span><span> last June). Now, manufacturers' focus has turned to </span><span><a href="https://www.vox.com/features/2019/6/19/18644129/instagram-gun-influencers-second-amendment-tactical-community?utm_source=morning_brew" target="_blank" class="link" rel="noopener" style="border-bottom:2px solid #1c7ff2;text-decoration:none;color:#333">female influencers</a></span><span>. </span>
</li>
</ul>
<h2 style="font-family:Helvetica, Arial, sans-serif;font-size:19px;font-weight:700;color:#000;margin-top:0;margin-bottom:15px;margin-right:0;margin-left:0">Don't forget politics </h2>
<p style="line-height:22px;margin-top:0;margin-bottom:15px">The trade show is taking place only a few miles from the site of the deadliest mass shooting in U.S. history...but that's not the only cloud hanging over the event. </p>
<ul style="margin-top:0;padding-left:30px">
<li style="line-height:22px;margin-bottom:10px">
<span>
</span><span><a href="https://apnews.com/c2812853be0b031d2e23661213a67923?utm_source=morning_brew" target="_blank" class="link" rel="noopener" style="border-bottom:2px solid #1c7ff2;text-decoration:none;color:#333">Calls to restrict</a></span><span> gun access and ban certain firearms are getting louder, while retailers like </span><span><a href="https://abcnews.go.com/US/walmart-limit-sales-guns-ammunition-wake-horrific-shootings/story?id=65361629&utm_source=morning_brew" target="_blank" class="link" rel="noopener" style="border-bottom:2px solid #1c7ff2;text-decoration:none;color:#333">Walmart</a></span><span> and </span><span><a href="https://www.cnn.com/2019/03/14/investing/dicks-sporting-goods-guns/index.html?utm_source=morning_brew" target="_blank" class="link" rel="noopener" style="border-bottom:2px solid #1c7ff2;text-decoration:none;color:#333">Dick’s</a></span><span> removed some guns and ammo from their shelves. </span>
</li>
<li style="line-height:22px;margin-bottom:10px"><span>Manufacturers like Colt, Ruger, and Remington are also facing slumping sales. </span></li>
</ul>
<p style="line-height:22px;margin-top:0;margin-bottom:15px"><strong style="color:#000">Looking ahead...</strong>the industry is watching Virginia, the new bellwether for state-level gun control.</p>

<!-- <![endif]-->
<table width="100%" cellpadding="0" cellspacing="0" border="0" style="border-collapse: collapse;">
<tr>
<th class="card" style="text-align:left;font-weight:400;font-family:Helvetica, Arial, sans-serif;font-size:16px;color:#333;display:block;background-color:#fff;border-radius:15px;border:1px solid #e6e6e6;border-collapse:collapse;box-shadow:none;margin-bottom:0px">

<td style="padding: 15px;">
<h3 style="font-family:Helvetica, Arial, sans-serif;font-size:16px;color:#1c7ff2;font-weight:700;margin-top:0;margin-bottom:0">
SPONSORED BY MANSCAPED
</h3>
<h1 style="font-family:Helvetica, Arial, sans-serif;font-size:24px;color:#333;font-weight:700;margin-bottom:0;line-height:26px;margin-top:8px">
<a href="#" target="_blank" style="color:#000000!important;text-decoration:none;border-bottom:none!important;">
<font color="#000000">
A Mower So Nice They Made It Thrice
</font></a>
</h1>
</td>

</table>
<a href="https://www.manscaped.com/?utm_source=morning_brew&utm_medium=cpc&utm_campaign=email_inclusions&utm_term=prospecting&utm_content=m" style="text-decoration:none;border:none;" target="_blank" class="">
<img alt="Manscaped" style="display: block; width: 100%; max-width: 670px;" width="670" class="story-header-image" src="https://dlp31coh2a67q.cloudfront.net/eyJrZXkiOiIxNTc4OTQzMTMxLmpwZyIsImJ1Y2tldCI6Im1vcm5pbmdicmV3LW9zbG8iLCJlZGl0cyI6eyJyZXNpemUiOnsid2lkdGgiOjEwMDAsImhlaWdodCI6bnVsbH19fQ==">
</a>
<p style="line-height:22px;margin-top:0;margin-bottom:15px;padding-left:10px;margin-top:5px;margin-bottom:0px;line-height:14px;">
<small><em></em></small>
</p>
<table width="100%" cellpadding="0" cellspacing="0" border="0" style="border-collapse: collapse;">
<tr>
<td style="padding:15px">
<p style="line-height:22px;margin-top:0;margin-bottom:15px">Many men are all too familiar with this bumpy reality: Mowin’ around down there can get a little hairy. That is, if you’re unfamiliar with <a href="https://www.manscaped.com/?utm_source=morning_brew&utm_medium=cpc&utm_campaign=email_inclusions&utm_term=prospecting&utm_content=m" target="_blank" class="link" rel="noopener" style="border-bottom:2px solid #1c7ff2;text-decoration:none;color:#333">MANSCAPED</a>.</p>
<p style="line-height:22px;margin-top:0;margin-bottom:15px"><a href="https://www.manscaped.com/?utm_source=morning_brew&utm_medium=cpc&utm_campaign=email_inclusions&utm_term=prospecting&utm_content=m" target="_blank" class="link" rel="noopener" style="border-bottom:2px solid #1c7ff2;text-decoration:none;color:#333">MANSCAPED</a> has been upping the personal grooming game for years. Now—after 18 months of research and development—they’re releasing their newest version of their iconic trimmer. Gentlemen, <a href="https://www.manscaped.com/?utm_source=morning_brew&utm_medium=cpc&utm_campaign=email_inclusions&utm_term=prospecting&utm_content=m" target="_blank" class="link" rel="noopener" style="border-bottom:2px solid #1c7ff2;text-decoration:none;color:#333">MANSCAPED</a> <strong style="color:#000">has announced the Lawn Mower 3.0</strong>.</p>
<p style="line-height:22px;margin-top:0;margin-bottom:15px">Like its predecessors, the Lawn Mower 3.0 is designed to give you a smooth, nick-free groom. But this isn’t the same ol' Lawn Mower of yesteryear. The enhancements on the Lawn Mower 3.0, if you please:</p>
<ul style="margin-top:0;padding-left:30px">
<li style="line-height:22px;margin-bottom:10px"><span>Advanced SkinSafe™ Technology with soft ceramic blades</span></li>
<li style="line-height:22px;margin-bottom:10px"><span>Upgraded 7,000 RPM motor with Quietstroke™</span></li>
<li style="line-height:22px;margin-bottom:10px"><span>Redesigned 600mA li-ion rechargeable battery</span></li>
</ul>
<p style="line-height:22px;margin-top:0;margin-bottom:15px">Plus, the Perfect Package 3.0 from <a href="https://www.manscaped.com/?utm_source=morning_brew&utm_medium=cpc&utm_campaign=email_inclusions&utm_term=prospecting&utm_content=m" target="_blank" class="link" rel="noopener" style="border-bottom:2px solid #1c7ff2;text-decoration:none;color:#333">MANSCAPED</a> now includes boxers and a travel bag, free.</p>
<p style="line-height:22px;margin-top:0;margin-bottom:15px"><strong style="color:#000">They’re offering Brew readers 20% off and free shipping today if you type “BREW” at checkout</strong>.</p>
<p style="line-height:22px;margin-top:0;margin-bottom:15px"><a href="https://www.manscaped.com/?utm_source=morning_brew&utm_medium=cpc&utm_campaign=email_inclusions&utm_term=prospecting&utm_content=m" target="_blank" class="link" rel="noopener" style="border-bottom:2px solid #1c7ff2;text-decoration:none;color:#333">Groom on, fellas</a>.</p>

<div class="c6 " style="margin-bottom:7px">
<!-- <![endif]-->
<table width="100%" cellpadding="0" cellspacing="0" border="0" style="border-collapse: collapse;">
<tr>
<th class="card" style="text-align:left;font-weight:400;font-family:Helvetica, Arial, sans-serif;font-size:16px;color:#333;display:block;background-color:#fff;border-radius:15px;border:1px solid #e6e6e6;border-collapse:collapse;box-shadow:none;margin-bottom:0px">
<table width="100%" cellpadding="0" cellspacing="0" border="0" style="border-collapse: collapse;">
<tr>
<td style="padding: 15px;">
<h3 style="font-family:Helvetica, Arial, sans-serif;font-size:16px;color:#1c7ff2;font-weight:700;margin-top:0;margin-bottom:0">
DATING
</h3>
<h1 style="font-family:Helvetica, Arial, sans-serif;font-size:24px;color:#333;font-weight:700;margin-bottom:0;line-height:26px;margin-top:8px">
<a href="https://www.morningbrew.com/daily/stories/2020/01/23/tinder-helping-users-get-dangerous-situations?email={{profile.email}}" target="_blank" style="color:#000000!important;text-decoration:none;border-bottom:none!important;">
<font color="#000000">
Tell Your Mom to Stop Worrying About Your Tinder Date
</font></a>
</h1>
</td>
</tr>
</table>
<img alt="An illustration of the Tinder logo as the earth " style="display: block; width: 100%; max-width: 670px;" width="670" class="story-header-image" src="https://dlp31coh2a67q.cloudfront.net/eyJrZXkiOiIxNTc5ODE0MjkzLmpwZyIsImJ1Y2tldCI6Im1vcm5pbmdicmV3LW9zbG8iLCJlZGl0cyI6eyJyZXNpemUiOnsid2lkdGgiOjEwMDAsImhlaWdodCI6bnVsbH19fQ==">
<p style="line-height:22px;margin-top:0;margin-bottom:15px;padding-left:10px;margin-top:5px;margin-bottom:0px;line-height:14px;">
<small><em>Francis Scialabba</em></small>
</p>
<table width="100%" cellpadding="0" cellspacing="0" border="0" style="border-collapse: collapse;">
<tr>
<td style="padding:15px">
<p style="line-height:22px;margin-top:0;margin-bottom:15px">Soon, Tinder users will have a way to get out of unsafe situations. Tinder owner Match Group <a href="https://www.cnn.com/2020/01/23/tech/tinder-panic-button-safety-tools/index.html?utm_source=morning_brew" target="_blank" class="link" rel="noopener" style="border-bottom:2px solid #1c7ff2;text-decoration:none;color:#333">rolled out a partnership</a> with location services app Noonlight that allows users to signal when they’re not comfortable with a date. </p>
<p style="line-height:22px;margin-top:0;margin-bottom:15px"><strong style="color:#000">How it works: </strong>Those who add Noonlight to their profiles <a href="https://www.washingtonpost.com/technology/2020/01/23/tinder-panic-button/?utm_source=morning_brew" target="_blank" class="link" rel="noopener" style="border-bottom:2px solid #1c7ff2;text-decoration:none;color:#333">can input information</a> about their dates, including who they’re meeting and where. </p>
<ul style="margin-top:0;padding-left:30px">
<li style="line-height:22px;margin-bottom:10px"><span>Users can hit a “panic button” if they feel they’re in danger. </span></li>
<li style="line-height:22px;margin-bottom:10px"><span>Users can also tell friends where they are. </span></li>
</ul>
<p style="line-height:22px;margin-top:0;margin-bottom:15px"><strong style="color:#000">Zoom out: </strong>Dating platforms have been <a href="https://www.buzzfeednews.com/article/hillaryflynn/tinder-lets-known-sex-offenders-use-the-app-its-not-the?utm_source=morning_brew" target="_blank" class="link" rel="noopener" style="border-bottom:2px solid #1c7ff2;text-decoration:none;color:#333">under fire</a> for not acting quickly enough to remove bad actors from their platforms. Registered sex offenders are banned from all of Match Group’s platforms, but the company doesn’t conduct background checks. And some platforms don’t require users to enter full names and addresses, which is <a href="https://www.wsj.com/articles/coming-soon-to-tinder-dates-panic-buttons-and-safety-check-ins-11579773600?utm_source=morning_brew" target="_blank" class="link" rel="noopener" style="border-bottom:2px solid #1c7ff2;text-decoration:none;color:#333">how they screen</a> out sex offenders. </p>
<p style="line-height:22px;margin-top:0;margin-bottom:15px"><strong style="color:#000">Looking ahead...</strong>the Noonlight feature will show up next Tuesday.</p>

<table width="100%" cellpadding="0" cellspacing="0" border="0" style="border-collapse: collapse;">
<tr>

<th class="card" style="text-align:left;font-weight:400;font-family:Helvetica, Arial, sans-serif;font-size:16px;color:#333;display:block;background-color:#fff;border-radius:15px;border:1px solid #e6e6e6;border-collapse:collapse;box-shadow:none;margin-bottom:0px">

<td style="padding: 15px;">
<h3 style="font-family:Helvetica, Arial, sans-serif;font-size:16px;color:#1c7ff2;font-weight:700;margin-top:0;margin-bottom:0">
QUIZ
</h3>
<h1 style="font-family:Helvetica, Arial, sans-serif;font-size:24px;color:#333;font-weight:700;margin-bottom:0;line-height:26px;margin-top:8px">
<a href="https://www.morningbrew.com/daily/stories/2020/01/23/brews-weekly-news-quiz-january-24?email={{profile.email}}" target="_blank" style="color:#000000!important;text-decoration:none;border-bottom:none!important;">
<font color="#000000">
Year of the Quiz
</font></a>
</h1>
</td>

</table>
<img alt="Pulitzer Prizes " style="display: block; width: 100%; max-width: 670px;" width="670" class="story-header-image" src="https://dlp31coh2a67q.cloudfront.net/eyJrZXkiOiJ1cGxvYWRzL21lZGl1bS9hc3NldC83MTQ0L3B1bGl0emVyX3ByaXplcy5wbmciLCJidWNrZXQiOiJvc2xvLXByb2R1Y3Rpb24iLCJlZGl0cyI6eyJyZXNpemUiOnsid2lkdGgiOjEwMDAsImhlaWdodCI6bnVsbH19fQ==">
<p style="line-height:22px;margin-top:0;margin-bottom:15px;padding-left:10px;margin-top:5px;margin-bottom:0px;line-height:14px;">
<small><em>The Pulitzer Medal</em></small>
</p>
<table width="100%" cellpadding="0" cellspacing="0" border="0" style="border-collapse: collapse;">
<tr>
<td style="padding:15px">
<p style="line-height:22px;margin-top:0;margin-bottom:15px">Pulling for a Pulitzer. Jamming out to <a href="https://open.spotify.com/playlist/5s8443tfYUq3LLARJwGeYP?si=qcjYxpPkTP2ftfdr1Wtpzg&utm_source=morning_brew" target="_blank" class="link" rel="noopener" style="border-bottom:2px solid #1c7ff2;text-decoration:none;color:#333">Big Desk Energy</a>. Wishing you a happy Lunar New Year with lots of hongbao. It's the Brew's Weekly News Quiz. </p>
<p style="line-height:22px;margin-top:0;margin-bottom:15px">1. <strong style="color:#000">Fill in the blank: </strong><span>The U.S. Department of Transportation </span>debuted a proposal<span> to crack down on the use of ___________. </span></p>
<p style="line-height:22px;margin-top:0;margin-bottom:15px">2. The UN believes that Jeff Bezos's phone was hacked using the WhatsApp account of Saudi Crown Prince Mohammed bin Salman. In February 2019, Bezos's phone received a notification containing <strong style="color:#000">which of the following messages? </strong></p>
<ol style="list-style-type: lower-alpha;">
<li style="line-height:22px;margin-bottom:10px"><span>"Please stop the Washington Post personal attacks" </span></li>
<li style="line-height:22px;margin-bottom:10px"><span>"There is nothing against you or Amazon from me or Saudi Arabia"</span></li>
<li style="line-height:22px;margin-bottom:10px"><span>"Things have never been better between our countries" </span></li>
<li style="line-height:22px;margin-bottom:10px"><span>"Where is my package? I ordered it like three days ago" </span></li>
</ol>
<p style="line-height:22px;margin-top:0;margin-bottom:15px">3. <strong style="color:#000">Who said this?</strong> “I love TikTok...I’m a big fan.” </p>
<p style="line-height:22px;margin-top:0;margin-bottom:15px">4. <strong style="color:#000">And who said this? </strong>“The curse of poverty has no justification in our age. It is socially as cruel and blind as the practice of cannibalism at the dawn of civilization…”</p>
<p style="line-height:22px;margin-top:0;margin-bottom:15px">5. Earlier this week, we asked if you could match the faces to the names of important leaders meeting in Davos for the World Economic Forum. <strong style="color:#000">Do you remember who this person is?</strong></p>
<p style="line-height:22px;margin-top:0;margin-bottom:15px"><img src="https://morningbrew-oslo.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/1579641151.jpg" class="img-responsive" width="640" style="width:100% !important;max-width: 640px; width: 100%;" alt="Put names to faces at Davos  World Economic Forum/Manuel Lopez, CC BY-NC-SA 2.0"></p>
<p style="line-height:22px;margin-top:0;margin-bottom:15px"><em><sup style="display: inline-block; line-height: 16px;">World Economic Forum/Manuel Lopez, </sup><sup style="display: inline-block; line-height: 16px;"><a href="https://creativecommons.org/licenses/by-nc-sa/2.0/legalcode?utm_source=morning_brew" target="_blank" class="link" rel="noopener" style="border-bottom:2px solid #1c7ff2;text-decoration:none;color:#333">CC BY-NC-SA 2.0</a></sup></em></p>
<p style="line-height:22px;margin-top:0;margin-bottom:15px"><sup style="display: inline-block; line-height: 16px;"><em><strong style="color:#000">Answers:</strong> 1. Emotional support animals 2. "There is nothing against you or Amazon from me or Saudi Arabia" 3. Snap CEO Evan Spiegel 4. <span>Martin Luther King Jr.</span> 5. Klaus Schwab, the founder and executive chairman of the World Economic Forum</em></sup></p>

</td>

<table width="100%" cellpadding="0" cellspacing="0" border="0" style="border-collapse: collapse;">
<tr>
<td style="padding-right:15px;padding-bottom:15px;padding-left:15px;padding-top:0px">
<p style="line-height:22px;margin-top:0;margin-bottom:15px">Yesterday, <a href="https://admin.typeform.com/form/DQjMzF/results#summary?utm_source=morning_brew" target="_blank" class="link" rel="noopener" style="border-bottom:2px solid #1c7ff2;text-decoration:none;color:#333">we asked</a> if cutting a book in half to make it more portable <a href="https://twitter.com/alex_christofi/status/1219564301029138432?ref_src=twsrc%5Etfw%7Ctwcamp%5Etweetembed%7Ctwterm%5E1219564301029138432&ref_url=https%3A%2F%2Fwww.nbcnews.com%2Fpop-culture%2Fviral%2Ftweet-about-cutting-books-half-sends-twitter-tailspin-n1119356&utm_source=morning_brew" target="_blank" class="link" rel="noopener" style="border-bottom:2px solid #1c7ff2;text-decoration:none;color:#333">makes you a murderer</a> or if you have/would try it yourself. 88% said they wouldn't dare dissect Dostoevsky, while 388 flight attendants, backpackers, and people who really hate e-readers said they would be fine tearing up a tome if it made it easier to transport. </p>
<p style="line-height:22px;margin-top:0;margin-bottom:15px"><strong style="color:#000">Our favorite defense:</strong> It’s not murder…"It’s just a book haircut."</p>

width: 100%; max-width: 670px;\" width=\"670\" height=511 src=\"https://media.giphy.com/media/3o6Mb3OomPa9u6s7IY/giphy.gif\"\u003e\n\u003c![endif]--\u003e\n\u003c!--[if !mso]\u003e--\u003e\u003c!-- --\u003e\n\u003cimg class=\"story-header-image\" alt=\"Bart Simpson \" style=\"display: block; width: 100%; max-width: 670px;\" width=\"670\" src=\"https://media.giphy.com/media/3o6Mb3OomPa9u6s7IY/giphy.gif\"\u003e\n\u003c!--\u003c![endif]--\u003e\n\u003cp style=\"line-height:22px;margin-top:0;margin-bottom:15px;padding-left:10px;margin-top:5px;margin-bottom:0px;line-height:14px;\"\u003e\n\u003csmall\u003e\u003cem\u003eGiphy\u003c/em\u003e\u003c/small\u003e\n\u003c/p\u003e\n\u003ctable width=\"100%\" cellpadding=\"0\" cellspacing=\"0\" border=\"0\" style=\"border-collapse: collapse;\"\u003e\n\u003ctr\u003e\n\u003ctd style=\"padding:15px\"\u003e\n\u003cp style=\"line-height:22px;margin-top:0;margin-bottom:15px\"\u003eCredit scores are like Christine Lagarde or bringing extra socks to the gym—very, very important. They affect your chances of getting loans, credit cards, and dates. \u003c/p\u003e\r\n\u003cp style=\"line-height:22px;margin-top:0;margin-bottom:15px\"\u003eSo when Fair Isaac, which makes the popular FICO score, \u003ca href=\"https://www.usatoday.com/story/money/2020/01/23/credit-score-those-low-scores-see-drop-under-new-fico-criteria/4553540002/?utm_source=morning_brew\" target=\"_blank\" class=\"link\" rel=\"noopener\" style=\"border-bottom:2px solid #1c7ff2;text-decoration:none;color:#333\"\u003esaid yesterday\u003c/a\u003e it’s adjusting the model it uses to calculate people’s creditworthiness...we paid attention. \u003c/p\u003e\r\n\u003ch2 style=\"font-family:Helvetica, Arial, sans-serif;font-size:19px;font-weight:700;color:#000;margin-top:0;margin-bottom:15px;margin-right:0;margin-left:0\"\u003eIn broad strokes: higher highs, lower lows \u003c/h2\u003e\r\n\u003cp style=\"line-height:22px;margin-top:0;margin-bottom:15px\"\u003eAmericans with FICO scores on the higher end (680+) who keep paying their bills on time will likely \u003ca href=\"https://www.wsj.com/articles/fico-changes-could-lower-your-credit-score-11579780800?utm_source=morning_brew\" target=\"_blank\" class=\"link\" rel=\"noopener\" style=\"border-bottom:2px solid #1c7ff2;text-decoration:none;color:#333\"\u003eearn\u003c/a\u003e an even higher score. Those with lower scores (sub-600) who continue to fall behind on payments will be punished more severely than in previous FICO models. \u003c/p\u003e\r\n\u003cul style=\"margin-top:0;padding-left:30px\"\u003e\r\n\u003cli style=\"line-height:22px;margin-bottom:10px\"\u003e\u003cspan\u003eNo need to freak out. FICO said most people—about 110 million—will see a \u003c20 point change up or down, if any change at all. Plus, lenders can decide for themselves which FICO model to use. \u003c/span\u003e\u003c/li\u003e\r\n\u003cli style=\"line-height:22px;margin-bottom:10px\"\u003e\u003cspan\u003eFICO noted that 40 million consumers could see a big upswing in their scores and another 40 million could see a big downswing. \u003c/span\u003e\u003c/li\u003e\r\n\u003c/ul\u003e\r\n\u003cp style=\"line-height:22px;margin-top:0;margin-bottom:15px\"\u003e\u003cstrong style=\"color:#000\"\u003eOne other change:\u003c/strong\u003e Under a new FICO version, if you had a sterling payment history but started carrying larger balances in the past few months, your score might take a bigger hit.\u003c/p\u003e\r\n\u003ch2 style=\"font-family:Helvetica, Arial, sans-serif;font-size:19px;font-weight:700;color:#000;margin-top:0;margin-bottom:15px;margin-right:0;margin-left:0\"\u003eBig picture\u003c/h2\u003e\r\n\u003cp style=\"line-height:22px;margin-top:0;margin-bottom:15px\"\u003eThis is a 180 from the industry's recent direction...or at least a wide right turn. In the past few years, FICO and its credit reporting pals (Equifax, Experian, TransUnion) \u003ca href=\"https://www.wsj.com/articles/need-cash-companies-are-considering-magazine-subscriptions-and-phone-bills-when-making-loans-11568280601?mod=article_inline\u0026utm_source=morning_brew\" target=\"_blank\" class=\"link\" rel=\"noopener\" style=\"border-bottom:2px solid #1c7ff2;text-decoration:none;color:#333\"\u003eintroduced alternative criteria\u003c/a\u003e to nudge up credit scores and encourage new borrowers.  \u003c/p\u003e\r\n\u003cul style=\"margin-top:0;padding-left:30px\"\u003e\r\n\u003cli style=\"line-height:22px;margin-bottom:10px\"\u003e\n\u003cspan\u003e\n\u003c/span\u003e\u003cspan\u003e\u003cstrong style=\"color:#000\"\u003eOne of those criteria: \u003c/strong\u003e\u003c/span\u003e\u003cspan\u003eTransUnion sells data to U.S. lenders that may show whether consumers subscribe to magazines. It’s an “indicator of stability,” the firm’s SVP of global data strategy told the WSJ.\u003c/span\u003e\n\u003c/li\u003e\r\n\u003c/ul\u003e\r\n\u003cp style=\"line-height:22px;margin-top:0;margin-bottom:15px\"\u003e\u003cstrong style=\"color:#000\"\u003eBottom line: \u003c/strong\u003eThe changes reflect, in part, hesitations over the U.S. economy. The record-breaking expansion is still going strong, but consumer debt is at an all-time high and lenders don't want to take on unnecessary risks.\u003c/p\u003e\n\u003c!-- SOCIAL LINKS collapse;\"\u003e\n\u003ctr\u003e\n\u003ctd style=\"padding:15px\"\u003e\n\u003cp style=\"line-height:22px;margin-top:0;margin-bottom:15px\"\u003eSoon, Tinder users will have a way to get out of unsafe situations. Tinder owner Match Group \u003ca href=\"https://www.cnn.com/2020/01/23/tech/tinder-panic-button-safety-tools/index.html?utm_source=morning_brew\" target=\"_blank\" class=\"link\" rel=\"noopener\" style=\"border-bottom:2px solid #1c7ff2;text-decoration:none;color:#333\"\u003erolled out a partnership\u003c/a\u003e with location services app Noonlight that allows users to signal when they’re not comfortable with a date. \u003c/p\u003e\r\n\u003cp style=\"line-height:22px;margin-top:0;margin-bottom:15px\"\u003e\u003cstrong style=\"color:#000\"\u003eHow it works: \u003c/strong\u003eThose who add Noonlight to their profiles \u003ca href=\"https://www.washingtonpost.com/technology/2020/01/23/tinder-panic-button/?utm_source=morning_brew\" target=\"_blank\" class=\"link\" rel=\"noopener\" style=\"border-bottom:2px solid #1c7ff2;text-decoration:none;color:#333\"\u003ecan input information\u003c/a\u003e about their dates, including who they’re meeting and where. \u003c/p\u003e\r\n\u003cul style=\"margin-top:0;padding-left:30px\"\u003e\r\n\u003cli style=\"line-height:22px;margin-bottom:10px\"\u003e\u003cspan\u003eUsers can hit a “panic button” if they feel they’re in danger. \u003c/span\u003e\u003c/li\u003e\r\n\u003cli style=\"line-height:22px;margin-bottom:10px\"\u003e\u003cspan\u003eUsers can also tell friends where they are. \u003c/span\u003e\u003c/li\u003e\r\n\u003c/ul\u003e\r\n\u003cp style=\"line-height:22px;margin-top:0;margin-bottom:15px\"\u003e\u003cstrong style=\"color:#000\"\u003eZoom out: \u003c/strong\u003eDating platforms have been \u003ca href=\"https://www.buzzfeednews.com/article/hillaryflynn/tinder-lets-known-sex-offenders-use-the-app-its-not-the?utm_source=morning_brew\" target=\"_blank\" class=\"link\" rel=\"noopener\" style=\"border-bottom:2px solid #1c7ff2;text-decoration:none;color:#333\"\u003eunder fire\u003c/a\u003e for not acting quickly enough to remove bad actors from their platforms. Registered sex offenders are banned from all of Match Group’s platforms, but the company doesn’t conduct background checks. And some platforms don’t require users to enter full names and addresses, which is \u003ca href=\"https://www.wsj.com/articles/coming-soon-to-tinder-dates-panic-buttons-and-safety-check-ins-11579773600?utm_source=morning_brew\" target=\"_blank\" class=\"link\" rel=\"noopener\" style=\"border-bottom:2px solid #1c7ff2;text-decoration:none;color:#333\"\u003ehow they screen\u003c/a\u003e out sex offenders. \u003c/p\u003e\r\n\u003cp style=\"line-height:22px;margin-top:0;margin-bottom:15px\"\u003e\u003cstrong style=\"color:#000\"\u003eLooking ahead...\u003c/strong\u003ethe Noonlight feature will show up next Tuesday.\u003c/p\u003e\n\u003c!-- SOCIAL LINKS --\u003e\n\u003ctable width=\"100%\" cellpadding=\"0\" cellspacing=\"0\" border=\"0\" style=\"border-collapse: collapse;\"\u003e\n\u003ctr\u003e\n\u003ctd style=\"padding-top: 12px;\"\u003e\n\u003ca href=\"https://www.facebook.com/sharer/sharer.php?u=https%3A%2F%2Fwww.morningbrew.com%2Fdaily%2Fstories%2F2020%2F01%2F23%2Ftinder-helping-users-get-dangerous-situations\" target=\"_blank\" rel=\"noopener\" style=\"text-decoration: none;\" class=\"\"\u003e\n\u003cimg alt=\"\" style=\"display: inline-block;
